participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Adventurous, optimistic, and enthusiastic about life.
participant_1.background: I enjoy taking care of animals and using my nice office supplies. I like the Beatles. I'm looking forward to seeing Justin Timberlake in concert this weekend. I enjoy a variety of music, but my favorite is probably classic rock. My favorite book is The Alchemist, because it reminds me that I can achieve anything if I set my mind to it.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Creative, thoughtful, and practical with a love for crafting.
participant_2.background: My previous job was as a seamstress, and I used to love creating custom quilts for my customers. I care about social media enough to stay connected with my friends but not enough to let it take over my life. I live in my hometown right now, but I'm planning to move to Australia in the future. I won a bowling tournament last year, and my CD collection is still safe. I like cheeseburgers and doing laundry on weekends.

content.text: Hey, I'm excited to see Justin Timberlake in concert this weekend!
Oh cool! I love his music. I'm actually planning to move to Australia in the future, so I'm not sure if I'll be able to see him on tour.
That's awesome! What made you decide to move to Australia?

I've always wanted to live in a different country, and Australia seems like a great place to start. I'm also a big fan of the Australian Open, so I'm hoping to go to a tennis tournament while I'm there.
That sounds like a great plan! I'm sure you'll love it there.
Thanks! I'm excited to experience a new culture.
I know what you mean. I recently moved to a new city, and it's been a lot of fun exploring a new place.
That's awesome! What city did you move to?
I moved to San Diego. It's a beautiful city with a lot to offer.
Oh cool! I've heard great things about San Diego. I'm sure you're enjoying it there.
I am! I love the weather and the beaches.
Those are two of my favorite things!
